database

Class DatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseConnection

  • public class DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseConnection class creates and manages the database connection for Android application. This is a Singleton class. Current implementation is only for MySQL database.
    Author:
    Abhishek Joshi, Anand Tirthgirikar, Sandesh Prabhu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.sql.Connection con 
      private int count 
      private static DatabaseConnection databaseConnection 
      private java.lang.String databaseName 
      private java.lang.String hostName 
      private java.lang.String password 
      private java.lang.String port 
      private java.sql.PreparedStatement st 
      private java.lang.String username 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private DatabaseConnection()
      This constructor creates MySQL database connection with host name, host port, database name, user name and password as variables defined in this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearTables()
      This method deletes all the entries from the tables user_route_mapping, user and routes.
      static DatabaseConnection getInstance()
      This is a factory method that returns the only database connection created.
      void insertRoute(int schoolCount, java.lang.String route)
      This method inserts route details in the table routes.
      void insertUser(int userCount)
      This method inserts user details in the table user.
      void insertUserRouteMapping(int userRouteMappingCount)
      This method inserts the mapping of the users with their routes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseConnection

        private DatabaseConnection()
        This constructor creates MySQL database connection with host name, host port, database name, user name and password as variables defined in this class.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DatabaseConnection getInstance()
        This is a factory method that returns the only database connection created.
        Returns:
        The database connection

      • clearTables

        public void clearTables()
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method deletes all the entries from the tables user_route_mapping, user and routes.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Some error while deleting entries from the table

      • insertRoute

        public void insertRoute(int schoolCount,
                        java.lang.String route)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method inserts route details in the table routes.
        Parameters:
        schoolCount - Contains the number of schools
        route - Contains the route details
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Some error while insertion

      • insertUser

        public void insertUser(int userCount)
        This method inserts user details in the table user.
        Parameters:
        userCount - Contains the number of users

      • insertUserRouteMapping

        public void insertUserRouteMapping(int userRouteMappingCount)
        This method inserts the mapping of the users with their routes.
        Parameters:
        userRouteMappingCount - Contains the mapping from user to routes
